body_html:
Okay, all comments are addressed, except: should we move EntryWorld and ExitWorld out of the top-level block and into the graph? This is not consistent with how graph inputs/outputs are done, but maybe we want to start moving special nodes out of blocks. It also violates the invariant that every node belongs to exactly one block, but I'm not sure how important that is given the specialness of these nodes.

Also, don't mind the test failures; one unfortunate side effect of adding an output value to EntryWorld unconditionally is that it changes the value names in every graph. I wanted to get feedback on the changes before fixing up ~80 tests 😛.

body:
Okay, all comments are addressed, except: should we move `EntryWorld` and `ExitWorld` out of the top-level block and into the graph? This is not consistent with how graph inputs/outputs are done, but maybe we want to start moving special nodes out of blocks. It also violates the invariant that every node belongs to exactly one block, but I'm not sure how important that is given the specialness of these nodes.

Also, don't mind the test failures; one unfortunate side effect of adding an output value to `EntryWorld` unconditionally is that it changes the value names in every graph. I wanted to get feedback on the changes before fixing up ~80 tests 😛.
